definition: A solid structure built to separate and enclose spaces, typically made of various materials such as bricks, concrete, or stones. It is commonly utilized to divide territories, protect boundaries, or provide privacy.

examples.english: The wall has been standing for centuries.

examples.german: Die Mauer wurde im Jahr 1989 abgerissen.
Die Mauer trennte Ost- und Westdeutschland.
examples.english: The wall separated East and West Germany.

examples.german: Die Mauer war ein Symbol des Kalten Krieges.
examples.english: The wall was a symbol of the Cold War.

examples.german: Die Berliner Mauer war 155 Kilometer lang.
examples.english: The Berlin Wall was 155 kilometers long.
